alert.note: Alert for Andrew; Buchanan; Holt; Platte (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 27 at 12:58AM CST until February 27 at 1:45AM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Wyandotte County in northeastern Kansas... Doniphan County in northeastern Kansas... Leavenworth County in northeastern Kansas... Eastern Atchison County in northeastern Kansas... Buchanan County in northwestern Missouri... Southeastern Holt County in northwestern Missouri... Platte County in west central Missouri... Western Andrew County in northwestern Missouri... * Until 145 AM CST. * At 1258 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Denton to near Atchison to near Williamstown, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... St. Joseph, Leavenworth, Lansing, Atchison, Savannah, Tonganoxie, Platte City, Basehor, Weston, Wathena, Elwood, Troy, Country Club Villa, Kansas City, Country Club, Agency, Dearborn, Camden Point, Amazonia and Rushville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 16 and 70. Interstate 435 between mile markers 17 and 31. Interstate 229 between mile markers 0 and 14. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
